text: Aap keh dijiye kay hum Allah Taalaa per aur jo kuch hum per utara gaya hai aur jo kuch ibrahim (alh-e-salam) aur ismail (alh-e-salam) aur yaqoob (alh-e-salam) aur unn ki aulad per utara gaya aur jo kuch musa (alh-e-salam) aur essa (alh-e-salam) aur doosray anbiya Allah Taalaa ki taraf say diya gaye unn sab per eman laye hum inn mein say kissi kay darmiyan farq nahi kertay aur hum Allah Taalaa kay farmanbardar hain
